description:
Greenfoot is an integrated development environment using Java or Stride designed primarily for educational purposes at the high school and undergraduate level.

Greenfoot is an integrated development environment using Java or Stride designed primarily for educational purposes at the high school and undergraduate level. It allows easy development of two-dimensional graphical applications, such as simulations and interactive games.
- Fixed Share to website function so that it works with new scenarios.
- Removed ability to share to standalone JAR.
